The OpenAPI Initiative Erik Wilde, OAI Ambassador: OAI Track Introduction and the State of OpenAPI

(4) A Brief History of OAI & OpenAPI

  • Started out in 2011 and was called Swagger [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Swagger_(software)] for quite a while
    • Competing approaches like RAML [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/RAML_(software)] and API Blueprint [https://github.com/apiaryio/api-blueprint] exist
  • Swagger was renamed to OpenAPI at the beginning of 2016
    • Donated to the OpenAPI Initiative (OAI) [https://www.openapis.org/] (part of the Linux Foundation [https://www.linuxfoundation.org/])
    • Swagger [https://swagger.io/tools/open-source/] now refers to a specific tool offered by SmartBear [https://smartbear.com/]
  • OpenAPI has been the official name since 2016
    • OpenAPI 2.0 was the name after the rename (it's the same as Swagger 2.0)
    • OpenAPI 3.0 was released in July 2017
    • OpenAPI 3.1 was released in February 2021


The OpenAPI Initiative Erik Wilde, OAI Ambassador: OAI Track Introduction and the State of OpenAPI

(9) OpenAPI Extensions 

  "components" : {
    "securitySchemes" : {
      "myAuthorizer" : {
        "type" : "apiKey",
        "name" : "Authorization",
        "in" : "header",
        "x-amazon-apigateway-authorizer" : {
          "identitySource" : "method.request.header.Authorization",
          "authorizerUri" : "arn:aws:apigateway:us-east-1:lambda:path/2015-03-31/functions/arn:aws:lambda:us-east-1:account-id:function:function-name/invocations",
          "authorizerResultTtlInSeconds" : 300,
          "type" : "request",
          "enableSimpleResponses" : false
        },
        "x-amazon-apigateway-authtype": "Custom scheme with corporate claims"
      }
    }
  },
  "x-amazon-apigateway-importexport-version" : "1.0"
  • openapi-amazon-extensions.json (line 21-38)

OAI Specification Work Erik Wilde, OAI Ambassador: OAI Track Introduction and the State of OpenAPI

(12) OpenAPI Overlays

  • OpenAPI documents are increasingly connecting tools and user groups
  • Not everybody wants/needs/should get the full description of everything
  • Overlays support different views of the same OpenAPI documents


OAI Specification Work Erik Wilde, OAI Ambassador: OAI Track Introduction and the State of OpenAPI

(13) Workflows

  • OpenAPI describes atomic interactions with resource-oriented APIs
  • Many/most APIs rely on meaningful combinations of individual interactions
  • Workflows represent the idea of interaction sequences within/across APIs
  • Workflows do not intend to be readily executable descriptions


OAI Specification Work Erik Wilde, OAI Ambassador: OAI Track Introduction and the State of OpenAPI

(14) OpenAPI Compliance Project

  • OpenAPI is a semantically rich specification
  • Some relationships across the model are hard to identify and verify
  • OASComply define an abstract model of OpenAPI and constraints for this model
  • It will be easier for vendors and customers to verify specification compliance
